about.title: About Me (Character Status)
about.subtitle: My Story
about.missionText: Full-Stack Developer with a focus on front-end, passionate about performance, UX, and clean code. Expert in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. I work as a full-stack developer building critical features with Node.js on the backend and React on the frontend, with complex API integrations and a focus on performance and security. I have led Vue.js to React migrations and also worked on the backend with Node.js, integrating multiple insurance companies via APIs.

interestsList.integration: System and API Integration (Open Finance, Payments)
interestsList.ai: Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing
